descriptions.description: You awaken in a damp cell. You are scheduled for execution. With a slight preference for living you decide to escape instead.

actions.description: You stand up and take a look around.

descriptions.description: The metal door stands open. The wooden box stands under the ceiling grate. The floor is cold stone covered in rubble.
